row.entry: 2.101 (b), definitions “Emergency”, “Major disaster”; “paragraph (3) of definition “Micro-purchase threshold”; and paragraph (1) of definition “Simplified acquisition threshold”.

entry.p: Amend section 2.101 in paragraph (b)(2) by—
a. Adding in alphabetical order the definitions “Emergency” and “Major disaster”;
b. Revising paragraph (3) introductory text of the definition “Micro-purchase threshold”; and
c. Revising paragraph (1) introductory text of the definition “Simplified acquisition threshold”.

row.entry: 2.101(b) introductory text amended; (b)(2) definitions, “Computer software” , “F.o.b.”, “May”, “Signature or signed”, “Technical data”, “United States”, and “Value engineering change proposal (VECP)”

entry.p: Amend section 2.101 by—

iii. In the defined term “May”, removing “* * *” and adding “...” in its place;
vi. In the defined term “United States”, removing “Subpart” and “Part” and adding “subpart” and “part” in their places, wherever they appear; and
vii. Revising paragraph (1) of the defined term “Value engineering change proposal (VECP)”.
